data.actual_result: The upload bar just disappears and absolutely nothing happens
data.expected_result: You should get an error saying that the explicit content filter rejected it. On Desktop it is handled by Clyde sending you a client-side message
data.short_description: If you're attempting to send an image flagged as explicit in a channel with explicit content filter enabled, the upload bar vanishes and you won't get any error message
data.steps_to_repro: - Find an image that can potentially be flagged as explicit content - Post it in a non-NSFW channel where you have Attach Files permissions, and where the server has Explicit filter enabled for all members in Server Settings > Moderation
